prompts.title: Perspective Correction Failure Analysis
prompts.description: Analyzes why a specific perspective correction technique failed on an image.

variables.name: technique_name
variables.description: The name of the algorithm used (e.g., homography_basic)

variables.name: failure_description
variables.description: Brief description of the observed failure

prompts.content:
You are an expert in Computer Vision and OCR. I have applied the '{{technique_name}}' perspective correction to an image, but it produced poor results: {{failure_description}}.

Please analyze the attached image and artifacts. Identify potential root causes such as:
1. Extreme vanishing points
2. Lack of clear line segments
3. Noise or blur interfering with edge detection

Suggest 2-3 alternative approaches or parameter adjustments.

prompts.title: New Experiment Planning
prompts.description: Helps structure a new experiment with clear hypotheses and metrics.

variables.name: goal
variables.description: The main objective of the experiment

prompts.content:
I am planning a new experiment with the goal: {{goal}}.

Help me structure this experiment by defining:
1. A clear, falsifiable hypothesis.
2. The specific variables (independent and dependent).
3. Success metrics (quantitative and qualitative).
4. A step-by-step execution plan.
5. Potential risks and mitigation strategies.
